Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ nenio] e#y#u# n~rwmeoc: Maximoc nem Dometioc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, our holy roman fathers, Maximus and Dometius, that He may forgive us our sins.
